appShortcutName: mLauncher - Minimal and Clutter Free launcher
appDisplayName: mLauncher - Minimal and Clutter Free launcher
description:
Forked from mLauncher, +minimalization, +customizability

Forked from Olauncher: A minimal and clean launcher with enhanced features.

Forked with Extra Features

Features: - App Drawer Customization: Rename apps in the app drawer (home screen app renaming is already supported with a long click). - Advanced Gestures: A wide range of gestures, including taps and swipes, to trigger different actions. - Clock Customization: Position the clock independently of the home apps, giving more control over your home screen layout. - App Drawer Layout: Change the alignment of apps in the app drawer independently of the home screen. - Font Size Customization: Adjust the font size of sections of the home screen separately. - Privacy Focused: Removed internet permission, ensuring your data remains private. - Biometric Security: Lock settings behind biometric authentication (toggle option). - Crash Reports: Ability to report crashes via email for better troubleshooting. - App Usage Tracking: View app usage time directly from the home screen. Gestures Include: - Double Tap: Quickly tap twice to trigger a predefined action. - Clock Tap: Tap the clock to access additional features or settings. - Date Tap: Tap the date for easy access to the calendar. - Usage Tap: Tap on the total usage to view system or app usage data. - Short Swipes: Swipe up, down, left, or right to navigate or trigger different actions. - Long Swipes: Swipe up, down, left, or right for additional gesture actions. Possible Actions Include: - Open Specified App: Instantly open any app of your choice with a gesture. - Display App List: Show the full list of apps installed on the device. - Lock Screen: Lock your device for security. - Show Recently Opened Apps: Access recently used apps for quick multitasking. - Open Notification Drawer: Trigger the notification drawer with a swipe or tap. - Open Quick Settings: Access quick settings directly from the home screen. - Power Dialog: Open power options like shutdown, restart, and more. - Take a Screenshot: Capture the screen to save or share your content. - Switch Page: Quickly switch between home screen pages. - Disable Gesture: Disable specific gestures as needed. Translations: - Arabic - Dutch - English - French - German - Hebrew - Italian - Japanese - Korean - Lithuanian - Polish - Portuguese - Russian - Slovak - Spanish - Thai - Turkish
